name: Road Redemption
blurb: Please help make this game possible!  Road Rash-style gameplay, with next-gen graphics, physics, and online play.

rewards.reward: No Reward

ROAD REDEMPTION SUPPORTER

 ==============================
We sincerely thank you for helping us create this amazing game.  As a supporter you get Access to the exclusive ROAD REDEMPTION DEVELOPER'S FORUM + a monthly pdf of the official ROAD REDEMPTION DESIGN.DOC.

DIGITAL GANGSTER

==============================

All previous rewards + A DRM-free digital copy of the ROAD REDEMPTION GAME upon release.
(includes previous tier)

Wii U / Xbox 360 TIER ============================== All previous rewards (including PC version) + A digital copy of Road Redemption for the Wii U or for the Xbox 360 (pending successful Xbox 360 stretch goal).
Wii U TANOOKI TIER ============================== All previous rewards (including Windows/Mac/Linux version) + A digital copy of ROAD REDEMPTION for the Wii U.

DIGITAL ROAD WARRIOR

============================== 

All rewards from previous tiers + access to the to the ROAD REDEMPTION OPEN BETA + your name (or moniker) in ROAD REDEMPTION HALL OF FAME, that's accessible from the game's main menu.
DIGITAL DESTROYER\r\n============================== All rewards from previous tiers + exclusive access to the early ROAD REDEMPTION CLOSED BETA.
DIGITAL DESTROYER CHROME TIER ============================== All rewards from previous tiers + the kickstarter-exclusive CHROME BARBED WIRE BASEBALL BAT for use in single and multiplayer game modes.

DIGITAL COMMANDER

==============================

All rewards from previous tiers + A digital copy of the ROAD REDEMPTION ART BOOK, which includes concept art and a tour of the game's evolution in pictures + COMMANDER STATUS  in the official Road Redemption developer's forum. + A DRM free version of the OFFICIAL ROAD REDEMPTION SOUNDTRACK

DIGITAL MASTER\r\n============================== All rewards from previous tiers + access to the exclusive ALPHA VERSIONS OF ROAD REDEMPTION as they're completed + your NAME CARVED in the wood of the gang's CLUBHOUSE WALL, in the Road Redemption single player campaign.

SPECIAL EDITION DVD TIER ==============================\r\nAll rewards from previous tiers + A physical copy of Road Redemption on DVD. (Note: The September 2013 date is when you will have access to the alpha version)
T-SHIRT TIER ============================== All rewards from previous tiers (except for the physical copy of Road Redemption) + an official ROAD REDEMPTION T-SHIRT in your choice of black or white.
DVD + T-SHIRT TIER ============================= All digital rewards + ROAD REDEMPTION T-SHIRT (black or white) + SIGNED PHYSICAL COPY of Road Redemption on DVD.
CUSTOM CHOPPER DIGITAL TIER ============================== All previous digital rewards + the backer-only D-3X70 CONCEPT motorcycle, for the singleplayer and multiplayer game.
DIGITAL GANG PACK ============================== Two copies of all of the rewards in the DIGITAL MASTER tier.
CUSTOM CHOPPER TIER ============================== All rewards from the digital master tier + ROAD REDEMPTION DVD + a special, backer-only motorcycle for the single player and multiplayer game.

CUSTOM CHOPPER + T-SHIRT TIER ============================== All rewards from the digital master tier + ROAD REDEMPTION T-SHIRT (black or white) + a special, backer-only motorcycle for the single player and multiplayer game.

CUSTOM USB TIER ============================== All rewards from the digital master tier + ROAD REDEMPTION on a custom, BRUSHED-METAL USB DRIVE, which will also include the soundtrack and digital art book.  \r\n\r\n(Note: The September 2013 date is when you will have access to the alpha version)
BARBARIAN TIER ============================= All rewards from the custom usb tier + a backer-exclusive MELEE COMBAT WEAPON for use in single and multiplayer modes.

LEGENDARY RIDER TIER ==============================All rewards from the digital master tier + a backer-exclusive MOTORCYCLE for use in the single and multiplayer modes + The STUN BATON (a backer-exclusive weapon for use in single and multiplayer modes.)

ART APPRECIATION TIER ============================== All rewards from the Custom USB tier + a physical copy of the ROAD REDEMPTION ART BOOK + a character in Road Redemption will be named after you or the person of your choosing.

BUTTERFLY KNIFE TIER ============================== All rewards from the digital master tier + your copy of the digital art book, Road Redemption game, and soundtrack in the form of a ROAD REDEMPTION BUTTERFLY USB DRIVE.  Only 25 of these will ever be produced.
BE THE PLAYER TIER ==============================\r\nAll previous digital rewards + an avatar based on YOUR LIKENESS for use in the singleplayer and multiplayer game.

IN THE GAME TIER ==============================All rewards in the custom USB tier + a character in the game will be modeled after a likeness of you + name a principle character in Road Redemption (if it's too goofy, it will be the character's nickname).

BE THE PLAYER TIER (Physical) ==============================\r\nAll previous digital rewards + choice of any 2 physical rewards (DVD, Art Book, T-shirt, brushed metal USB, Butterfly USB) + an avatar based on YOUR LIKENESS for use in the singleplayer and multiplayer game.

ROAD REDEMPTION REMIXER ============================== All rewards from the digital master tier + Road Redemption source code, assets, and project files 3 months before they're made public + a full license with all LEGAL RIGHTS to use our source code, assets, and project files in your own COMMERCIAL game.

BE THE VILLAIN TIER\r\n==============================\r\nAll previous digital rewards + choice of any 2 physical rewards (DVD, Art Book, T-shirt, brushed metal USB, Butterfly USB) + name the main villain in the game and choose his/her likeness.  He/she can be modeled after you or anyone you choose (assuming they give persmission).

DINNER WITH THE TEAM TIER ==============================All rewards from the Road Redemption Remixer tier + Round Trip flight from anywhere in the continental US to New Orleans, Louisiana where the Road Redemption team will take you out to dinner and show you around New Orleans.(accommodations not provided).

THE WHOLE ENCHILADA TIER\r\n==============================All rewards from all previous tiers except the butterfly usb and naming a principle character.  In addition to the DINNER WITH THE TEAM reward of the round trip flight to New Orleans, Louisiana, we will also provide 2 nights accommodation at a hotel in New Orleans.
